titles.title: A resolution recognizing January 28, 2017, as "National Data Privacy Day".
A resolution recognizing January 28, 2017, as "National Data Privacy Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary:
Recognizes January 28, 2017, as National Data Privacy Day.
Encourages governments, individuals, and relevant organizations to protect the privacy of individuals.
